name: Wasteland (itch) (brentspector)
description:
Following an explosion in the United States, you are sent with a team of investigators to discover the cause of the disaster. Dodge ghouls, maneuver around rubble heaps, and collect clues as you proceed through the once vibrant region. Should the campaign mode prove too easy for you, the survivor mode allows you to customize the parameters of the game by altering one of five premade modes, or just fill in every box yourself. Feedback is welcome!

Video
